member.name: T:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService
member.summary: defines a platform-independent service for updating the Application.

member.name: P:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.CanShutdown
member.summary: Gets a observable value indicating whether the application can be safely closed. Terminating during an update operation can result in a crash.

member.name: P:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.IsInstalled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the application running from the installation path. If false, this is typically caused by running a debug copy from a build directory, indicating that updates cannot be accurately installed.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.GetVersionsAsync
member.summary: Gets all versions of the application that are currently published.
member.returns: A collection of for all published releases.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.StartUpdateTimer(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Starts a background task that will run and check for updates on a regular interval.
member.param: The interval on which to check for updates.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.CancelUpdateTimer
member.summary: Cancels the background update timer.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUpdateService.CheckForUpdatesAsync
member.summary: Checks for updates and automatically installs any applicable updates.
member.returns: A representing the asynchronous operation. A return value of true indicates that updates were successfully installed. A return value of false indicates that updates were not required because the current version is up-to-date. A return value of null indicates that the update service was unavailable.

member.name: T:UpdateAssistance.IUserInterfaceDispatchService
member.summary: provides a service for dispatching calls on the the user-interface thread of an application.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUserInterfaceDispatchService.Invoke(System.Action)
member.summary: Invokes an action sychronously on the UI dispatcher.

member.name: M:UpdateAssistance.IUserInterfaceDispatchService.InvokeAsync(System.Action)
member.summary: Invokes an action asychronously on the UI dispatcher.
